name: Just End It
description:
You're a guy who decided to just end it - you want to commit a suicide.

How to play

Click when the moving foot is on the block you want to reach to move, reach two suicide ways - knife and poison.

Created for Slavic Game Jam 2015, theme - Just do it! Team:

  • Anna Trzcińska - art
  • Klara Popławska - code
  • Konrad Gadzina - code, music
